# title

**Instance Property**

A short title for the challenge definition.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get }
```

## Getting the display properties and image

- **details**: A more detailed description of the challenge definition.
- **loadImage(completionHandler:)**: Loads the image set on the challenge definition, which may be `nil` if none was set.

items.description: A more detailed description of the challenge definition.
